content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing the sky on two different days because the clouds were unusal one day very lacy and the sunset was nice the next day; and both times very pretty. i did not see the discs until i was zooming in on the photographs to see the detail. both objects seem disc-like and shiny. 

i seem to be having a fair number of recent sightings and am so glad to have captured these on digital media, even though i did not notice them at the time.

these were taken the middle of the first week in september in north central texas. the photos were taken with a sony cybershot 7.2 megapixel camera on automatic settings. i also noticed that another person from nct, very near by has also submited a report with photos of similar object.
content.summary: Dayligt photos of shiny discs in clouds

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i rented on of the band members of thr "moodie blues" homes during the summer of 81 we slept on the deck to watch the stars. what  ido rember is seeing an increadible beam of ligt bearing down on the "hemphill property(the road is called blue bird lane) this is just above corral cayon/the73 station.What i do rember is seeing the light running naked down the dirt road.My next memory is watching a huge ship pass overhead and falling asleep. greg and i never spoke of this(he was my roomate). only after reading communion did my memeroies come to the surface. ibelieve that i was showen horrible events that were in our future. im not a crack pot . as a matter of fact my father was a gs-17 attached to wright patt and then reassinged to edwards afb/area 51 maybe he would only say he was in nevada.To lend creadability to this my dad held/holds several patenets for avanonics. the last one that im aware of was for the airforce one in yhe late 60's early 70's it was an antenna off the rear stabilser(i think that was the placement)iam very interested in being regressed/hypothinesed,either way i know what i know and thats ok
content.summary: I was on mydeck over looking the ocean when we saw the light from above

content.detailedDescription:
I am a practicing architect, ex air force pilot(studied meteorology), and a member of mufon.

on sunday, september 8, 2008, at 1000 hours, i began observing the mt.St.Helens volcanocam, real-time-image on my windows xp pc, taken from the johnston ridge observatory, which is at 4500 foot elevation and about 5-miles nnw of the volcano. the volcanocam image updates every 60-seconds.

i intended to meditate for 30-minutes by focusing on some minute aspect of the dormant volcano. rising from within the volcano, a whispy steam cloud ascended and crowned the right inside slope of the crater. at the same altitude as the right rim of the volcano, and about one-sixth of the diameter of the caldera distance out from the right rim was a small blimp-like, white, cumulous cloud the right end of which was spherical. the potato-with-onion shaped cloud appeared directly alongside the volcano. 

the movement of the misty cloud of steam suggested a left-to-right breeze, which also suggested that the small white cloud would drift steadily to the right.  curious, i scribed a vertical line on the window glass, with a felt-tipped pencil, at the left end of the small white cloud. since the image updated every 60-seconds, i knew the movement of the white cloud would be easily seen. the white cloud measured only one-half inch in length on the computer glass. and i chose to focus on the left end of the cloud while meditating. i began focusing/meditating at 1008. minutes passed. the image updated every 60-seconds. but the white cloud was absolutely static. 

then i recalled reading in a ramtha book "ufo's and the nature of reality",  ed. j.P. koteen, page 177: ufo's..."they appear as clouds. you will often see them when there is nothing else in the sky except one particular cloud." the small, unusually static, white cloud was the only cloud visible. at 1025 it vanished. a same diameter, white, also static, spherical cloud remained. (i printed a color copy of the volcano which just shows the left edge of the remaing cloud.)at 1039 it also vanished.

at 1455 the same day,i returned to the volcanocam.  a similar-to-earlier,
small, white cloud hovered above the earlier spot. i made a color copy of the computer image which shows the left end, only, of the new cloud.


 don m. johnson




p.S. 

a year ago while driving in ventura, i stopped at a traffic light.
i was facing the ocean a little over a mile away. a brisk on-shore breeze swiftly bore a low-level-blanket of small cumulous clouds inland. but i noticed a small, but dense white cloud that hovered statically over the beach, while the other clouds raced around it. the scenario did not change as i drove toward the beach for several blocks and turned away.


dmj
content.summary: A small, solitary, stationary, static cloud vanished after 20 minutes of being observed bu me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back from my cousin's house on thursday, august 4th, 2008 at around 11 o clock and i saw this light in the sky. the area i was driving in is a rural area, the nearest town is about 3 miles away, and that town only has 2000 people in it probably. at first i'm like, "oh, that's probably a plane"; but since i've always been intrigued with lights in the skies, i watched it as i drove home. as i'm looking at it, i realize the light doesn't look like a plane at all, because it's shimmering like a star would, and seems to be shifting colors between white, blue, purple and green. i could tell it wasn't a star however, because it was bigger and brighter than anything else in the sky, even the north star; and also it was moving side to side slowly. so i stopped my car and watched it, and the light kept getting bigger and the light looks even more strange the closer it gets, it was probably the weirdest light i've ever seen, i wish describing it could do it justice... so i'm like "i wanna know what this is, i'm going to go follow this thing." so i turn my car around and follow it, which was a distance of about a mile, and maybe 2 minutes; and i get onto a side road and start to realize that the light is close, like real close; like maybe 100 feet in the air at most, probably lower. i get within probably 50 feet of it, and stop my car. it just hangs there in the sky, not moving. from my angle it seemed to be rather small (compared to other accounts of triangle-craft i've heard after i witnessed this), somewhere between the size of a military jet and a concorde jet. so i just looked at it, searching for a rational explanation, but couldn't think of any. it had three lights on it, one on the "front" that was the bright shifting light i saw before, and two dimmer lights that form a triangle (and from what i could tell, the craft looked like a triangle). the lights were all white (as opposed to an aircraft which has a green and red light on each wing so other planes can know what direction it's heading). then it starts moving real slow away from me, and just disappears as it got about half a mile away. from what i could tell it had no sound, which an aircraft or helicopter would being that low, and it also moved too slow to keep itself aloft like that if it were an aircraft. the entire time my heart was racing, as i knew this was not something that could be explained by any justification that i could think of at the time. (i was actively trying to "debunk" what i was seeing as it was happening) i also have seen a "green fireball" years before that zoomed over my house at roughly 50 to 100 feet. there is the possibility it was a meteor, but seeing as it was so close to the ground and yet still roughly the size of an rv, it seems there would've been an impact somewhere close that would be reported. since then, i have watched the skies for any other signs of things i couldn't explain, and on the night in question; it definitely paid off!
(i have included this link to a video i found a few days later when trying to research what i had seen, this is exactly what i saw on the night in question!) http://www.Dailymotion.Com/swf/kvacbipxibr4svk4z2
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular object with vivid lights hovering for several minutes, then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up around 5:40am and looked out my window facing west from the 7thfloor of my building to look at the rain coming down. when i looked i saw a very bright light low in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane but it did not move or blink . then i thought it must be a planet. so i went about my business of making the bed and starting the coffee. as i was going into the bathroom to take my shower i heard someone yelling down below on the city street. so i quickly went to the window and looked down to find a tow truck down on the street. my attention then went back to the light in the sky which was still bright white and in the same location. i looked out the window some more and then to my amazement i saw this bright white object start turning orange and getting bigger in size. but it still did not move. i was then wondering what this could be. this object as it turned orange got 3 times bigger in size. this object then turned smaller and then got back to its original size and bright white. but it still did not move. as i watched this object it then turned off and just disappeared. i saw no objects flying away or lights blinking. then all of a sudden the object came back in the same spot it was in when i first saw it and now it was blue. it then disappeared again, only to come back to the bright white object still in the same stationary spot.
 i then was running late for work and took my shower. when i came out i quickly went back to the window and saw the bright white object still in the same location in the sky.
 this time this object disappeared and then came back to a blue color and then back to the white stationary object in the sky. then while this one object was there another same sized and same bright white object came out of the sky to the south of it and it then hovered to its right next to it very close. i was thinking what is this. i turned on the news searching for breaking news and bad accidents that may involve helicopters. i found none that morning. as i watched the second object join next to the first, this object remained white and stationary to the first object. then another same bright white object appeared out of nowhere and joined the 2 other objects and formed what looked like a triangle. the third object hovered below the 2 other objects.
both the second and third objects moved to the right of the object and just disappeared into thin air. i waited and watched as the first light i first saw just disappeared into thin air. this all happened within 25 minutes.
content.summary: Bright white stationary object turns different colors and is joined by two other objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a photo assignment in san pedro sula, honduras. i went up on the second story of a small building to take some panorama shots of the mountains in the background and the area in general.

while doing my pre edit of the photos that evening is when i first notice the object on the screen on my camera (canon 40d). when using the scroll wheel on the back of the camera i could really see how the object is moving in flight.

at first i thought that it might be dust on the cameras senor, but 1. dust is always darker in color and 2. both shots are taken at the same time because the camera was set to high speed and dust doesn't move.

please note the object was moving so fast my naked eye never noticed it until that evening while i was doing my pre edit. so, while scrolling back and forth in the cameras playback screen right to left and so on, i could clearly see it was some type of unidenafiable object moving very fast.
content.summary: Object moving at a high rate of speed from left to right

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i don't know if this was a dream or if something really happened but what i remember doesn't seem like a dream and i can still remember parts of it very clearly. i woke at about 5 am with what seemed to be this dream. but it sure seemed like it just happened. i wrote it down right then and drew the sketches of what i saw. it started when i found myself outside and as i looked ahead of me i saw a small very bright light then all of a sudden a very bright flash. when i turned around there were 3 small grey beings standing there. i wasn't afraid (i don't know why). they then told me (telepathically i think) that they needed help (i don���t remember for what) and asked me to help them. i agreed. then i looked up and saw a huge craft hovering near us then i saw a second one about 400 ft away from the "main" one (it looked the same). the next think i remember is looking up at the night sky and it was like someone just pulled the sky apart and there was an opening maybe 200ft across. i could see blue sky and clouds in the opening and a humming sound (i didn't hear anything while under the craft earlier). i looked to the left of me and there were two other people stand near me looking up as well. i never saw these people before and none of us seemed to be able to talk or move much (it was like we were all just becoming ���un-paralyzed��� or something). there wasn���t a sound or a breath of air moving. there was some light at ground level that illuminated everything but i couldn't turn to see what or where it was. then all of a sudden the small gray beings were gone and then the first ship flew in to the opening in the blink of an eye and the second one followed right behind. the sky closed. that's all i remember until i woke up (or got back). 

now the really weird part is my 8 year old daughter was sleeping on the floor because as i later found out she couldn't sleep in her room. later this morning when i was talking to my wife on the phone and before i told her anything about what i saw she said the our daughter had woken her up in the middle of the night (3:30) and saw a lot of very bright flashing lights outside of our upper (roof) dormer window. when i ask her about them before she went to school she said that she though there were about 11 of them. she closed her eyes and said when she opened them a little while later they had stopped. i guess that���s what got me thinking, did i really have a dream or did something really happen? 

updated: since i wrote that at five in the morning on friday sept. 5th 2008 and now 3 days later it���s still all i can think about. i have been having headaches since this happened and seem to be very moody. when i was out mowing the mower stopped and as i got off i looked up and i had a ���flash back��� of that being the exact spot where we were all standing looking up at these two craft (we live out in the country and have a lot of area). again the longer it���s been the more i feel this really happened.
content.summary: 2 craft - 3 aliens.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a mufon section director and a certified field investigator. it was friday the 5 of sept at about 12 noon when i receive a phone call at my home from a gentleman which will remain unnamed at this time.  

he was speaking fast and seem very excited he told me that he had talked to a person in tx that gave him my name and told him about the mufon website. he said i have photos of hundreds of ufo's that he has taken over his house and barn since july of 2008, some of fleets and some of vehicles every large and wide. he said he has seen some with his eye and some only after taking a photo of the sky do they appear in the photo. he thinks there in the gamma or something. he has shown them to his neighbors and he told me they freak out. he called the state police which came to his house and they told him they had never seen anything like this before, and also mentioned to him about contacting mufon.  

now, he would like mufon to come investigate and see his photo evidence collection. before something happens to them. he wanted me to come right away, that night if possible. i told him i would come but not tonight. i wanted to bring others with me to investigate he's claims and that i would call him back with a date and time. he said that would be fine. so i called the ky mufon state director and left him a message. the state director called me back later that afternoon. while i was talking with the state director about this case, the guy calls me back, i put the state director on hold and talk to the guy. he says listen to me i have just taken a picture with about 50 ufo in it flying over my home. he was very excited and told me listen do you have a digital camera. i said yes, he said run out right now and take a photo of the sky looking north toward louisville. there coming your way, you won���t see anything with your eyes but take a photo anyway, i said ok, he said i mean it, i���m not crazy. do it so you can see i���m telling the truth. i hung up with him and went back to the state director who was still holding. i told the state director  what the guy had said to me. and we both thought i should go out and do what he asked. so,i put the state director on hold again went outside with the camera in tow to my back yard, looking northwest toward louisville the sky was totally grey and overcast. i didn���t see anything with my eyes but, i took a picture as instructed and went back inside to talk to the state director, i took out the sd card from the camera and put it into the my computer then said holly sh*t, still on the phone with the state director he asked me to email the photo to him. i waited on the phone till he received it. then the state director looked at and had the same comment i did, the state director counted 53 ufo a fleet as he called it. 
boy, now to say the least, this was not turning out to be your typical average day for a section director and a state director here in ky mufon.
i live in bowling green, ky which is south of louisville. since i didn���t see these with my naked eye. i can���t tell you the direction they where moving, but since he told me they were heading my way which is south of him and he does live near louisville. so i would say they were moving southward toward me and the camera, please note as you look at each object all are exactly straight up and down that is odd to me. also odd to me is the fact he told me he saw about 50 in his picture and oddly we counted 53 in the one i took. as i said there was nothing in the sky when i took this picture and i heard no sounds and it wasn't raining. and if these were geese or birds i would have seen them with my naked eye and not taken the photo. i would have watch there flight path 1st to determine what they where. also there were no nat's flying around me at the time either. i took this photo with a kodak easyshare c643 - 6.1 megapixel with a kodak af 3x optical aspheric lens 36mm ��� 108mm (equivalent) it has an automatic lens cover and the lens was clean. and i was looking at the screen when i took the photo and didn't see anything but the overcast grey sky. the only thing i wish, was that there would have been an other object in the photo like a tree or something for size and depth, but i didn't do that just shot the open grey overcast sky.
we are currently playing phone tag with the gentleman that contacted me. so i have not seen the picture he took the same day before he called me as of yet. the ky mufon state director is also currently coordinating other ky mufon field investigators to investigate his other claims and accompany us to his home to interview him and see his other photographs.
content.summary: Possible fleet of ufo's over ky.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on porch and i noticed a v shaped object although it looked like it had several compartments that were attached it was white or maybe gray , couldent tell if it was emitting light or blocking light.Thought it might have been birds but there wasnt any flapping motions.Was fairly large heading west.Seemed to be going much faster that birds would have been.Lost sight of it due to a roof.And there were two wittnesess we both agreed of what we saw and did discuss it for awhile before reporting it.
content.summary: V shaped object flying west bound

content.detailedDescription:
My brother richard wanted me to contact you again.  you already had a field investigator interview him about a week or two ago. he called me today and stated he seen the silver sphere ufo's again: twice on 9/6/08 and twice on 9/7/08 (today) but this time he has photos. i don't know if he as a digital camera to upload it to a pc or just an old type roll film but you might want to check the photos and/or talk to him again.

ricks brother dennis in denver
until rick gets his pc up and running again you can contact him
through me at dbeauvais04620@peoplepc.Com if you cannot get his cell.

i do not have the photos on my pc. he hasn't sent them to me yet.
content.summary: Sphere as priorly reported

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside because the neighbor's dogs were barking and i wanted to see what was going on. when i looked up into the north/north east part of the sky i saw 2-4 different areas where there were lights flashing. i went back in and got my binoculars to check it out. i could see then that there was some sort of craft. not an airplane...

too far up to get a good glimpse. but i did get some odd pictures in which i will attach 3 of them. i took several.

i know that whatever those were they stayed in the same area for a long time...I went inside after about 10 mins. this was friday 090508 and since then there is more in the sky. i also took more pics of them today in different and the same areas. i will also do a report for those....

i know someone will be able to check them out and know then what it was that i was looking at. there is alot of activity around here lately. not only do i sense it and feel it, i know.
content.summary: Pictures of  green , white and blue lights flashing way up high. came out odd on digital camera.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out my west-facing bedroom window at approximately 9:00 p.M., i noticed a bright white-yellow light in the western sky at approximately 45 degrees above the horizon, less than 1000 ft. in altitude, and maybe (at most) 1 mile away.  the light was much brighter and a little larger than a star or planet.  it drifted very slowly in the same general position for about 5 minutes before i went outside and scanned the skies with and without binoculars.  i observed the same light for about 10 minutes outside and then went back in.

at about 10:05 i went back outside to see if that or any other lights could be observed.  at this time i noticed at approximately 75 - 80 degrees above the northern horizon there were several objects with red, blue, and white-yellow lights at a high altitude (probably more than 1000 feet, but still close to this altitude).  i went inside and asked my sister who was visiting at the time to come out and look with me.  she observed the same things i have described.  at times there was no noise, and at other times we could hear the sounds of distant small planes.  these objects traversed the sky, always remaining in view and finally 2 of them assumed a stationary position in the north and northwestern sky.  we watched them remain stationary for about 15 minutes and then returned inside.

i went to my bedroom to look out the 2 windows that face, one north and one west.  i observed an object in the northeastern sky, as viewed from my north-facing window, that was about 30 - 35 degrees above the horizon.  it had probably been obscured from view outside by a large maple tree in the neighborhood.  it had the usual blue, red, and white-yellow lights of the objects i have been viewing for a week now.  i called my sister and mom into the the room and they observed the same object.  it was just east of the dayton international airport, less than a 1/4 mile from it, and about 300 - 500 feet high.  we watched it for about 15 minutes and then my mom and sister went to bed at around 10:40.

i continued to periodically observe this object until about 1:00 a.M.  for about the last 1 1/2 hours i noted that the object in the northeast was accompanied by 3 other objects with horizontally configured white-yellow lights (approximately 5 ).  sometimes each of these objects also looked like a ring of lights.  the lights on each object were evenly spaced.  these objects would appear to fade in and out of view as if being obscured by something.  even when they were observable they were curiously faint.  the original object, however, was clearly visible at all times.  it never appeared faint.  these other 3 objects were at approximately the same altitude as the original and maybe 50 yards south of it.

after 1:00 a.M. i lost sight of these objects through the north-facing window.  i looked out my west-facing window and now noticed there were at least 4 objects in the western sky maybe 1/4 mile south of the airport.  they only had white-yellow lights.  one of the objects appeared as a vertical line and through the binoculars i could see what appeared to be 5 windows vertically aligned with a barely visible and much smaller white-yellow light just feet from the "windows" and to the left of them.  this appeared to be a light attached to the top of the craft with windows.  the "window" in the middle of the line of windows (the 3rd) was considerably brighter than the others. this vertically aligned craft was clearly visible, but the other 3 objects were very faint, not hardly visible to the naked eye, but clearly discernable (though faint) through binoculars.  three of the craft were more or less horizontal to the ground.  these objects were about 300 - 500 feet up and 30 - 35 degrees above the horizon.

there was a group of around 5 people sitting around a campfire at a neighboring house west of me and the objects were a little further west and north of them.  their party broke up at approximately 2:30 a.M. when 2 groups of people got in 2 cars and drove away.  within several minutes of this, the 4 objects slowly drifted away northward and out of view behind trees in the surrounding yards.  i saw no more objects from my windows after this for about 15 minutes when i stopped looking for the night.

the viewing conditions this evening were sometimes very clear and at other times there were 20 or 30 minutes of cloudiness that obscured viewing.
content.summary: Ufos hovering near dayton international airport

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend was watching this night , i have seen many  ufo's over the years, and was turning him on too them'' we started at 9.30 pm.
the first sighting was at 9.40 pm a very small foo fighter came from out of the tree's & was watching us, this lasted for 2 min's. after this at 10.50pm we had a star like light that moved like a satlight? it came along
and just went out? after this at 12.10 am one star like light was in the sky'' it was like it was looking at us'' i told my friend to get ready''
right after this'' it lit up the whole sky '' and it became 25 times bigger!!!  it stayed there for 25 sec'' then darted left and died out''
content.summary: The watchers

content.detailedDescription:
En las fotos que a continuacion les enviamos aparecen dos luces sobre la sierra de san miguelito en el estado de san luis potosi mexico, y en la siguiente foto  lo que parecen ser dos seres flotando y vestidos con trajes y cascos semejantes a astronautas, en esta foto es preciso utilizar zoom y estudiarla con detenimiento (al centro de la foto aparecen estos seres en color amarillo).
igualmente los invitamos a contactactarnos tenemos alrededor de 100 fotografias de ufos, ya que en nuestra ciudad al parecer existe una base de ufos.  desgraciadamente no hablo el idioma ingles.

por su atencion gracias.

atentamente 
gabriel berrones casasola
content.summary: Fotos tomadas de seres no identificados
content.locationName: San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there!

me and my girlfriend saw a strange thing near hannover. it was clear sky. i saw this thing (see picture) in the sky... it was about twice the size of the moon (as seen from earth).
during the next minute it moved from right to left a distance about three times of its size. then it faded away, without getting smaller.

well i don���t belive in ufo���s or such things, and so i don���t think that was one. but, i���m really curious what it was, so maybe someone here has an idea...

thanks
manuel
content.summary: Strange thing in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the object out my kitchen window for at least a week. thought it was a close planet.  then one evening my neighbor and i went to a meeting where a group was lecturing on ufos.  a man in the audience was very rude, cat-calling, whistling, etc.  i turned to glare at him, my thought was that he looked strange.  my friend also turned later and commented how strange he looked.  to our surprise he was called up onto the platform and was part of the group. one spoke of a mother ship and its location.  i told my friend that i see that every evening and it is just a big planet.  i would show her when we got home.  after the lecture everyone was taken out doors and was shown what they said were ufos. i saw nothing but stars and said so.  the strange looking young man decided to talk to my friend and me later inside.  he was a nice looking red head w/freckles.  he started telling us what they were doing here, but when he switched from saying "they" are doing such and such and said "we are doing" etc.  when he did that i believe my mouth dropped open and my brain shut off.  could not come up with the questions i now wished i had asked.  from what he told us it sounded like a minor scientific excursion.  as in gathering plant life, etc.
when we got home i started to show my friend the "planet".  it was not there and i haven't seen it since.   thinking about the young man all these years trying to know what was different about him.  the only thing i can come up with is perhaps his skin texture may have been the difference.  
this happened 30 plus years ago.  i have never have been able to talk to anyone about it.  that is anyone that might have answer for me.
i hope you can shed some light on what we experienced.  i have never forgotten this young man.
sincerely,
jd
content.summary: quite bright like a close planet

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting out of the pool in my backyard and looked at the moon and
noticed something strange right next to it. it was a triangle shaped 
formaition. right away i knew it was a ufo. it just sat next to the moon.
i started yelling it was a ufo. my mom told me to go inside then.
content.summary: Triangle object by the moon.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving toward home after getting an early breakfast in greeneville.  ty was driving and i (jennifer) was in the passenger seat.  i look over in the sky toward sunrise (the sky had just lit up and turned to daylight) and saw what appeared to be a white streak of a light.  i didn't say anything, but ty turned and looked at it too.  he said, "look, the space station..." a long pause and then... "or a ufo."  i said i had been watching it too.  

we pulled onto the main highway (highway 107) from greeneville and at this time of morning traffic is picking up a bit, so we had cars both behind us and coming in the opposite direction.  all of a sudden the object dropped altitude and flew in our direction (not following the highway, but crossing it) and it dropped so low i was able to see the outline of the ufo.  it was either black or gray in color, clearly a triangle shape, and had three large white or yellow lights underneath.  i remember seeing two or three smaller lights of the same color between those three lights that made up the triangle.  i was able to see it so clearly because it flew right over our car and it was broad daylight by this time.  i estimate it to have been as low as four or five power line poles high (my husband judged 1,000 feet high but he couldn't see it at the point when it passed over us because he was driving).  it was flying relatively slow by smoothly with no noise and went in the opposite direction of sunrise, toward the mountains.

friday night we saw something else.  my husband was alone getting gas nearby our home when he spotted a strange amber/orange colored light in the sky over a mountain toward greeneville.  even though he was driving back home he could see it in certain places over the course of about 10 minutes.  when he got home he asked me to come outside, and i did.  from our yard (we live in a very rural area) we have a good view of the greeneville city lights in the distance.  this light appeared to be hovering over the mountain.  we have plenty of cell tower blinking lights and flood lights, etc. but this was none of those.  i told ty to run in and get his telescope.  as soon as he went inside the light disappeared.  i yelled back in the house, "nevermind, it's gone!" and as soon as i said that it reappeared in the same spot.  ty brought his telescope out and started to try and get it in view.  the light was slowly moving behind the mountain by this time.  as soon as he got it in view with the telescope, the light disappeared.  it was no star because it had been moving in the opposite direction of the way moon comes up, and it had disappeared and reappeared.

neither of us were scared during either sighting, just more amazed.  we felt it necessary to contact mufon because, while this was my first ufo sighting, it was not my husband's first.  for three mornings in a row back in june of this year (the month is estimated, we didn't write it down at the time) he was driving to work and saw these things around 4:30am.  the first time scared him to death.  the first morning a triangle was extremely close to the ground (so close it could have been touching, but he doesn't think it was touching the ground) right beside the road in a pre-season tomato field.  as he drove closer the object rose up slightly and tilted so he saw the lights underneath.  he said they were yellowish in color.  when he got even closer it disappeared.  that afternoon, on his way back home he noticed grass depressions in the (what is now) tomato field.  the next morning he saw another one further away in a different field, and yet again the next morning he saw an object in the sky.  after discovering the grass depressions in the tomato field we took a camera out to take pictures.  while driving by snapping shots we found other fields with similar grass depressions, all along about a three mile stretch of highway 107 (the opposite end of the 107 highway from greeneville).  we have those pictures on our computer.

this does appear to be a hot spot for ufo activity and mufon should be aware of this.  i am attaching the evidence from my husband's first encounter a few months ago.
content.summary: Triangle seen in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying my rc airplane in erwin park and first noticed an object at around 7:45 pm floating overhead at a very high altiude i could see some detail appeared some black and white areas on object could not tell shape was moving like a baloon with the wind.  at one time it looked like it stoped for about 30 seconds then moved backwards only slightly against the wind then continued on with the wind. duration about 8 min.  lost sight of it when i turned my head.  it seemed to be getting higher and smaller.   i have one picture of it but the camera i took it with is not very good and it appears as a white spot.
about 15 min. later like clock work i had a another sighting at 8:00 pm just like the one i saw yesterday at 8:pm this lasted about 2 min.  it was a star like object that appeared above and to the right of the moon about 6 degrees from the moon.  very bright same magnatude as jupiter. 
did not move.   lost sight when high thin clouds passed in front of it.  waited untill 8:30 pm getting dark,  dim magnatuide stars could be seen but not the object.  my wife saw this object again also.
content.summary: Two sitting in park 15 min apart one baloon like other star like

content.detailedDescription: This object was observed while at sandpoint beach in windsor, ontario in the late afternoon/early evening. the object was first noticed in the northeastern sky at an apparently high altitude and was probably over some part of the state of michigan. what caught our attention was that it apparently was not moving through the sky; however it appeared to be rotating and two of us agreed that it often appeared as a boomerang shaped object. it eventually became obvious that it was moving slowly to the east and apparently further away. after approx. 10 minutes it was not visible any more. our most rational explanation for the object was that it was a weather balloon or low satellite. we were not certain if it is possible to see a satellite in daylight, but this would explain it, considering the brightness of the object and the angle from the sun. it always appeared to be rotating or pulsating. it was constantly changing shape. it was definitely an unusual object and held our attention until we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Bright object visible in daylight, apparently rotating boomerang

content.detailedDescription: I have seen a 'ufo' 2 days in a row today is 3.I witnessed 50 or so silver orb,disk,shaped objects moving in a formation.They disapeard after about 5 min or so.But 6 stayed behind and i fot the 6 on photo and i got the group in a photo too.
content.summary: It was a cluster of 50 or so silver flying things.

content.detailedDescription:
9-6-08 9:05 pm local time hamilton (se) county

1)  observed in the sky ese direction from my location with binoculars set on 12x magnification one disk object with rotating multicolored lights. the disk proceeded ese from me to out of sight. observed for about 10 minutes.

2) unrelated to the above. tonight there are 9 total multicolored star type objects in the sky from my vantage point. none appear to be moving. 

4 due east or about 3 oclock in a arrow head pattern about 45 degrees up with a 5th directly above the arrow about 50+ degrees up.
1 at ne location or about 2 oclock about 50 degrees up. 
2 at a sw location or about 8 oclock and about 45 degrees up . these are close beside each other and just near the moon.
1 at due west or 9 oclock and about 50 degrees up
content.summary: 1) disk with multicolored rotating lights 2) nine multicolored star type objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pics of the sunset outside the house. i took a few pics and decided to take one over the house. i thought i saw something on the lcd screen (after the shot was taken) that wasn't visible to the naked eye. i came in to look at the images and caught something odd.

i went back out to take more pics. i stood in exact spot using the roof of the house as a reference point. nothing was there. i moved the camera to the left and right taking random pics with and without flash. the object was only visible after the photo had been taken and only showed up when i used a flash.

when i viewed the second batch of images, the object was there again, but jumping all over the sky. it moved all around like no plane or satelite. one minute it was there and the next it was not and then it reappeared somewhere else. 

the moon was half full and south/south west. i was facing due east. 

took random pics until it got too dark. i captured 7 pics showing the object.
content.summary: Object over house caught on digital camera

content.detailedDescription:
I was traviling south on rt 8 when i noticed a star like opbject in the sw sky. i pulled over to observe the object, during this time also witnessinmg two (2) comerical airiners flying in the general vecinity of the object. it was approxmetly 30-45 km away and was off to my ssw. i watched the object for approxmatly 4 min when it slowly faded out. it just disappeared. now im not crazy and i dont go lookin for alien space craft. but what i saw last night was on my mind and i had to tell post it somewhere where people would meet me without sceptsisim. 

now the real question is.. did anyone else see what i did???!!! please help me out here
content.summary: Spotted going south on rt8

content.detailedDescription: On 9-6-09 at 4:03 pm (cst), my girlfriend called me outside and pointed out a very bright white object almost overhead.  it appeared to be at least 8000 feet in the sky.  i retrieved my (10 by 50) binoculars and watched the object for a good 7 minutes from one position.  it was moving slowly from the southeast to the northwest.  it looked to be a kite sailing by, however, it had a cresent shape on one side and appeared to be changing shapes or changing its angle of orientation every second or two.  its size was about the size of a pencil erasier held out from an arms length.  i could not get a good look at the object due to its constant changing shape.  i quickly laid down on the lawn so i could steady my binoculars for a better look.  i am quite sure it did have a cresent shape on one side of its structure. i observed it move a good 45 degrees in the sky, coming straight overhead of my backyard orientation.  it had a very intense white hue to its shape also.  the only feature i could make out of its structure was its cresent side.  the cresent side was only visable as it appeared to be rolling over, changed its angle of orientation or changing shapes.  the cresent appeared to be in porportion with the rest of the object.  after about 7 minutes of viewing, the cresent side of the object began to change color from its bright white hue into red.  within 5 seconds of the cresent changing to red, the whole object appeared to have turned red and disappeared.  i scanned the sky for a good 5 minutes and could not see this object and observed nothing unusual.  the sky was clear with little wind and very few clouds.  the cresent moon was in the southeast but was not what i was observing.  this was my first ufo sighting.  i feel excited to report, i am now a believer.  my thanks to mufon and to all who report their events.
content.summary: Looked like a kite,  began changing shapes or  flipping onto its side.  cresent shape on one side, white in color,  turned red and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Observers:  wife and self.
brownsville, california, 95919.
time:  0825am.
duration:  25 minutes.
photos taken.

we were walking along our ridge (el.2800ft) west of brownsville, looking southeast over brownsville valley.  we were mildly arrested by a motionless rectangular black spot in the sky over the valley, and expected it presently to declare itself as a helicopter, but it remained unidentifiable and motionless long enough that i became curious and set my canon s5 digital camera on a rock to use as a telescope.  it has 48x magnification that can resolve the moons of jupiter.  
    my immediate reaction was:  "no way is that a helicopter!"
    then it began drifting westward, decreasing altitude.  i started snapping photos.  its motion was smooth like a balloon, no irregularities.  i finally concluded that it almost had to be some wacky balloon, but there seemed not enough volume to support any weight.  and it was bright reflective metallic not matte surface.  it looked heavy, compact, and structurally very complicated. 
    the object went between two superimposed ridges on the skyline, precisely where a forest fire had been receiving tanker drops 4 days earlier.  we at first thought it might be some govt recon vehicle doing a followup of that, but it was unnecessarily radical for such work, and we've never seen anything remotely like this in the past.
    distance to object was about 2-3 miles.  no sound, and the environment here is nearly silent. 

we realized later that the object, if it continued drifting westward following behind that ridge, would pass by the villages of rackerby amd bangor.  palermo is also in that direction.  beale afb is 15mi to the south.

photos available.  the object has turned slightly between photos so that stereo resolution is obviously possible, though we i haven't tried it yet.

d & r
brownsville
content.summary: Metallic object,, two shiney spheres attached to upper ends of vertical columnar structure.

content.detailedDescription: On the 30th my husband and i were out side sitting and talking when he told me to look up and in between two stars in the west the object was moving towards the south not going straight then the clouds came and covered it these were the size of the stars so they had to be really big for us tosee them. then we were watching a plane heading to san francisco and looked up higher and saw another star moving from the bottom of one star to the i guess east to west near the top of one going up. they really had to be big because each one like i said was the size of the stars.These were going in oposite directions.Mi told my husband that this was strange because the spacestation goes one way and these were going two different ways.Then on the 31st we saw coming from the north a strange craft that was green and red not pulsating going to the south like the east to the south. we ran to the front of our yard and it was big it got close to the airport and turned solid red i figured it was under radar cause we saw a plane that was going south but up higher than the red one. we knew it wasn't a copter or plane there was no sound.It turned towards kingscanyon national park cause the plane headed south towards l a.
content.summary: We saw on the 30th and 31st of august 2008to moving stars inbetween stars going oposite directione between the stars and a red green rectangular object no sound close to my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Was in zillow.Com checking to see how much value our home had lost. saw a pink/orange disc shaped object in the sky just to the west of the house. showed it to a few people at work, and everyone thought it was very weird and no one had ever seen anything like it. 

then had my daughter look at it.  she used a different search engine, maps.Google.Com, street view, our address (listed above, you said don't put personal information in this section).   we (my daughter, husband, and myself) spent an hour or so looking at various streets in our foothills community.  we saw it in many areas in different angles, behind clouds, behind trees, over telephone wires, etc., a little different in each location, closer, farther.  the pictures are big and clear.  we have a particular address in the area where it showed up quite far away, as though it were leaving our neighborhood at that point.

the appearance is a disc shaped object which is enclosed at the upper end of a larger (quite a bit larger) egg shaped filmy container (what else to call it?) that you can see through.  like a disc in a hazy plastic egg shell.

please contact me and i will walk you through this process.  there is no question of film being tampered with here as it is all on google.
content.summary: Saw a ufo on maps.Google over many areas in our neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting outside as we usually do and he was looking up and said look and up in space we saw a star shape moving between stars going from west to south inbetween stars going toward the very bright star,kinda going from high to a lower range. then the clouds covered it and as we were looking towards the north at this plane we saw another star shape moving between the stars going from west north to north total oposite directions,it was going from like the bottom of one star to the top of the other star.They both where changing directions.  i told my husband that that was strange cause i thought the spacestation only went one way. now this was much higher than that and the same size as the stars so they had to be big for us to see them.Then on the 31st of august we were watching the sky and talking when we saw this strange red and green light that was the size of a i guess jet no it was oblong flying no noise coming from the north to the south when it went to go by the airport the lights turned only a solid red no flashing and it was under radar because we saw a plane above it but not directly next to it.The red thing went towards the mountains like to kingscanyon national park cause the plane was headed different like to la cal.We live in fresno california and live close to the airport and if you want to telephone us i would be happy to talk to you.I contacted billy booth he was very sincere with the email hope i gave the right directions. this all happened between 10 and 11;30 at night. this is the forth something that we have seen in august 2008.You have my phone number you can call collect if you want.The red ship kept going until we couldn't see it anymore.The ship that was green and red to solid red got bigger as it came closer. we know this could not be a copter or a plane as there was no noise until we saw and heard the plane that went by.
content.summary: The 30th and 31st we saw stars moving west to south and west to north and a oblong red lights no flashing ship no wings no noise headed tothe south

content.detailedDescription:
On august 11, 2008, we had gone to sivaji park, visakhapatnam with my brother-in-law, to take the kids on an outing.  just as  we were returning from the park, i wanted to point out venus to the children. it was 7:00 pm indian standard time.  venus or what i thought was venus was fairly high in the sky.  i could see it as i stood.  it was then that we saw the ufo.  it was somewhat high in the sky ��� judge it to be between 1-2 km altitude, moving in a steady south westerly direction somewhat parallel to the orientation of the park.  it should be noted that there is an airport about 5 km directly in this direction.  the skies were somewhat cloudy but since it was high in the sky, we could see it clearly. what was visible was a dome (it seemed to be glass) with pulsing green, red and yellow lights.  the lights seemed to be tied to the reactions inside the engine.  when i first saw it, the craft was slightly to the left of venus, then it lined up with it and continued on its southwesterly route.  the lights were clearly visible.  a commercial aircraft which was at a much lower altitude (about 300 m) allowed us to compare notes ��� colors were similar although the pulsing was more rapid in the ufo. it was also moving at least 4-5 times faster than the commercial aircraft. what struck us was the speed with which the craft was moving and the total noiseless-ness (we could not hear the commercial craft either). the speed was definitely above mach 1 yet it was completely noiseless.  was the noise being muffled by clouds? i have to say that i have observed commercial jets and they move very slowly and are much slower; i have also seen the space shuttle flying over minneapolis the craft was atleast as fast if not faster than the shuttle.  it was gone from the horizon in 2 seconds, the time it took my brother-in-law to move about 15 feet.  also the dome seemed larger and the lights were clearly visible.  so the craft is a ufo in the strictest sense of the word, do not suggest an alien origin, although there seems to be a 10%
possibility that it was. sorry no multi-media available. have to say that i
am a professor of information systems in a u.S. university.
content.summary: Ufo/military craft? over skies of vizag
